subject: Track and Field
Steroids
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The former European 1,500-meter champion Sureyya Ayhan has tested positive for doping and faces a lifetime ban. Ayhan tested positive in the United States in September during training for next year’s Beijing Olympics, according to a report yesterday by Turkey’s state-run Anatolia news agency. Ayhan was suspended for two years for breaking drug-testing rules in 2004.
